title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 92 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 92 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: IT IS A GOOD THING TO GIVE THANKS UNTO THE LORD, AND TO SING PRAISES UNTO THY NAME, O MOST HIGH:
lineList.cn: （安息日的诗歌）称谢耶和华，歌颂你至高者的名。

lineList.en: To shew forth thy lovingkindness in the morning, and thy faithfulness every night,
lineList.cn: 用十弦的乐器和瑟，用琴弹幽雅的声音，

lineList.en: Upon an instrument of ten strings, and upon the psaltery; upon the harp with a solemn sound.
lineList.cn: 早晨传杨你的慈爱，每夜传杨你的信实，这本为美事。

lineList.en: For thou, LORD, hast made me glad through thy work: I will triumph in the works of thy hands.
lineList.cn: 因你耶和华藉着你的作为，叫我高兴。我要因你手的工作欢呼。

lineList.en: O LORD, how great are thy works! and thy thoughts are very deep.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，你的工作何其大，你的心思极其深。

lineList.en: A brutish man knoweth not; neither doth a fool understand this.
lineList.cn: 畜类人不晓得，愚顽人也不明白。

lineList.en: When the wicked spring as the grass, and when all the workers of iniquity do flourish; it is that they shall be destroyed for ever:
lineList.cn: 恶人茂盛如草，一切作孽之人发旺的时候，正是他们要灭亡，直到永远。

lineList.en: But thou, LORD, art most high for evermore.
lineList.cn: 惟你耶和华是至高，直到永远。

lineList.en: For, lo, thine enemies, O LORD, for, lo, thine enemies shall perish; all the workers of iniquity shall be scattered.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，你的仇敌都要灭亡，一切作孽的也要离散。

lineList.en: But my horn shalt thou exalt like the horn of an unicorn: I shall be anointed with fresh oil.
lineList.cn: 你却高举了我的角，如野牛的角。我是被新油膏了的。

lineList.en: Mine eye also shall see my desire on mine enemies, and mine ears shall hear my desire of the wicked that rise up against me.
lineList.cn: 我眼睛看见仇敌遭报，我耳朵听见那些起来攻击我的恶人受罚。

lineList.en: The righteous shall flourish like the palm tree: he shall grow like a cedar in Lebanon.
lineList.cn: 义人要发旺如棕树，生长如黎巴嫩的香柏树。

lineList.en: Those that be planted in the house of the LORD shall flourish in the courts of our God.
lineList.cn: 他们栽于耶和华的殿中，发旺在我们神的院里。

lineList.en: They shall still bring forth fruit in old age; they shall be fat and flourishing;
lineList.cn: 他们年老的时候，仍要结果子。要满了汁浆而常发青。

lineList.en: To shew that the LORD is upright: he is my rock, and there is no unrighteousness in him.
lineList.cn: 好显明耶和华是正直的，他是我的磐石，在他毫无不义。
